entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this afternoon. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow or ice pellets late in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
